import React from 'react' import img from '../images/pexels-photo-262978.jpeg' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Restuarantdetais() { const { id } = useParams() const resDetails = useSelector((state) => state?.restuarants?.resData?.resData) const selRestuarant = resDetails.find((data) => data._id == id) return (

{selRestuarant.resName}

FEATURES

{selRestuarant.features}

Location

{selRestuarant.location}

Type: {selRestuarant.foodType}

Neighborhood:

{selRestuarant.neighborhood}

Description

{selRestuarant.description}

Riviews

Food

Service

Atmosphere

 ) } export default Restuarantdetais
